reviews.review_title: Made me wanna lobotomize myself in the first few minutes.
reviews.content: There's no way to enjoy this film, unless you're brain dead and can't tell it different from anything else or if you were high, even then it probably wouldn't work. This film is anti comedy, so bad and so unfunny it begs the question how it was made, and somewhat a success.Pauley Shore and Stephen Baldwin plays two dimwit best friends who accidentally become test subjects of a Bio Dome project to sustain life for a year. Being forced to stay in the Bio Dome with the other scientists, their goofy antics ultimately ruin everything, including what comedy stands for.A lot of the comedy comes from Pauley and Stephen making goofy faces and noises. There's barely any attempt at a joke here. The best part about the movie is the Tenacious D cameo, that's pretty much it. The rest of the film is just these two dunderheads acting like idiots the whole time. And no, it's not entertainingly bad, because the film is also boring. It's only an hour an a half but it felt like an eternity because the whole film is basically filler, they're just goofing around all day. The point is that they're likablely stupid, but instead they're so painfully stupid I wanted to kill myself. I was so disappointed in the end when it looked like they died but then they didn't. If they had died that would have made up for the rest of the film, but instead they move on, though the film ends after that so oh well.I do not recommend this film to anybody. If you're curious, trust me, it's not worth it. The biggest waste of time I've ever had the displeasure of wasting. The 2nd worst comedy of all time, (the 1st being Meet the Spartans).

How is a film like this funny . Has humor progressed so far since it was produced . I wonder what sort of lady is Kylie, she reminds me of myself when I was young. We had her photo from a newspaper stuck on our kitchen wall when I went to performance college. I wish there was no mention of cigarettes in making an air filter. There could have been a few more jokes.Unfortunately I do not think the movie was on fire. Anything about a biosphere should be funny as there is really nothing much to do than think about anything that is a distraction from work at certain times .The movie should really succeed here .On the other hand the survival of mankind may depend on the functionality of these friends.

This movie is garbage and if you thought Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin could make a good comedic duo then you must have hit your head on a rock and after been caught in an explosion. The story is terrible, the main characters are so obnoxious, the side characters are also stupid, the acting was pitful, and the comedy, almost non-existent. My advice is avoid this movie like the plague and watch Dumb and Dumber instead, or watch the Bill and Ted movies since they are much more funnier and more tolerable than this piece of s***. This is one of the worst comedies of all time and one of the worst movies I've ever seen.1/10.

reviews.review_title: The Singular Worst Movie I Have Ever Seen
reviews.content: This movie insults intelligence on several different levels. I was made to sit through this ghastly abomination of cinema by curious friends. The story is awful and I can't believe how anyone could find this funny. Avoid like the plague.

reviews.review_title: It is bad enough to make you angry...
reviews.content: It's the same gag over and over and it wasn't funny the first time. Sometimes mindless entertainment is exactly what you're looking for, keep looking. I hope everyone involved regrets it and is appropriately ashamed. Even when talent is on screen this film has a way of making them unlikable, maybe 15 million just wasn't enough of a budget. This may be the most poorly directed film I've ever seen. Ever heard of Jason Bloom? This film is why and deservedly so.

reviews.review_title: So bad, makes me want to spray CFCs everywhere and dump raw sewage in the sea.
reviews.content: Imagine two of the most stupid, whiny, obnoxious, so-annoying-you- want-to-gauge-their-tiny-brains-out-with-a-spoon type characters. Imagine if they communicated in NOTHING but 90's 'dude'slang, and dressed like the worst excesses of that decade. Imagine if all they talk about was urination, defecation, drugs, alcohol, and sex. Especially that last one (although, why any lady with a pulse would give them anything other than a kick in the 'nads' is beyond me.) Imagine being stuck with them in a closed-off, secure area for a year, and having to listen to them, smell them, see them.... TALK to them... For all that time...Ladies and gentlemen, I think I've just discovered the scenario where I could commit murder and legitimately not give a sh*t. The best part is... Not a jury in the world would convict me. In fact, there might just be a queue of Christians and Buddhists stretching round the block, just to poke their lifeless corpses with a stick. They really are that hateful.But what with this being a script dragged from out of the Twilight Zone, where being a complete moron is somehow attractive to the opposite sex, these idiots have to TURN DOWN most of the attention they get from the opposite gender. You see, they're babe magnets... But they're also faithful to their girlfriends. Bless. Amongst the ladies spurned are one Kylie Minogue... And you can forget Neighbours and her early pop career, THIS will forever be the nadir of her existence. Even if she got convicted of chicken molesting tomorrow, starring in Bio Dome will NEVER be topped in terms of her personal Hall Of Shame.So anyway, our two 'heroes' (Never have I used the term so loosely) get trapped inside a dome for 365 days with some scientists. Inside, is every hippy's wet dream... A completely self maintained environment with plants, cattle and clean air. Needless to say, it takes the pair of bozos less than a month to mess everything up... They contaminate the water, kill all the wildlife and hold a MASSIVE party which virtually destroys the greenery. Nice job, guys. And we're meant to LIKE these nimrods?Not to worry, though. Because this is a movie WITH A MESSAGE, redemption isn't too long in coming. And, in the most unlikely, far- fetched ways, they use the rubbish left over from their big bash to revive this wannabe Garden Of Eden, and become national heroes in the process. How they figure out how to use all this litter to save the day despite being clueless about all things environmentally, or why they're suddenly lauded for clearing up THEIR OWN MESS is a complete mystery, but those little plot holes aren't the worst problems here by a LONG shot. Oh, no.It's not funny. It will never be funny. Even at the time of it's release, I doubt anyone was laughing. I know I keep banging on about this, but our central duo are HORRIBLE. Their puerile conversations are on the level of a toddler, and their immature behaviour makes a crying baby seem sophisticated. I can't really explain it... You have to see them, to believe them. It's HATE at first sight. You want to physically harm these people... Even though you KNOW they're just actors playing a role (Incidentally, did Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin have any idea how irritating they were while playing these wretched parts? Apparently not. It's amazing how blind you can be when you have a moderate pay check dangled in front of you).Their 'change of heart' comes completely out of left field, and is only inserted to provide Greenpeace with a happy ending. Besides, even after their conversation to saving the planet, they're STILL just as grating as ever. As is the pacing, (The first month in the dome takes around an hour in length, the other eleven elapse in less than half of that) the supporting roles, (the girls in the film only exist to fawn all other the two douchebags and try and sleep with them... Yes, even the allegedly 'strong, independent' female scientists), the script, (Who thought THIS awful story was worth making into a movie? Someone must LOVE wasting money) In fact, pretty much everything.It's just a colossal FAIL from top to bottom, a film which should be laughed at and despised until the Earth DOES end.Which will be a lot quicker, if crap like this is the best they've got as propaganda... 1/10

Since Pauly Shore is the king of comedy, I saw it, and my friends were very wrong, this movie is hilarious! There were some parts that Pauly Shore seemed a little homosexual, like the way he talked and stuff. But it was still hilarious. It's your basic "so stupid it's funny" comedy about 2 lazy bum-like people, Bud and Doyle, who mistake the Bio-Dome for a mall. and they get locked in there with 5 other scientists for a year. And then the chaos begins. I give Bio-Dome 10 stars!!!

reviews.review_title: The only Pauly Shore movie worth watching
reviews.content: OK... After seeing this movie get ripped apart in the reviews I had to come to it's defense. It's hilarious! Is it stupid? yup! Is it sophomoric? yup! Is it stoner humor? yup! But those are it's charms... I've seen other Pauly Shore movies and I was bored with them & never found them funny, Bio-Dome is the exception. A lot of my friends as well find this movie funny so it's not just meIf I were to give any reason as to why I find it so funny it would probably be the interaction between Pauly Shore an the Baldwin guy. They are so stupid their funny and I put them in this movie on par with Dumb & Dumber. If this movie doesn't tickle your funny bone then go to the doctor and have the stick removed from your butt.

reviews.review_title: A Comedy powerhouse, (Don't believe the Haters!)
reviews.content: My word, this picture is the finest damn film ever shot. How could such a comedic gem become a hated laughingstock? People forgot how to laugh. Ever since Nixon publicly castrated Bozo the clown on Match Game, it seems the kids forgot laughter makes the juices flow weed and feed. But of course, this movie weeds and feeds, but the weeds outway the feeds. For instance, why are those hot ladies after these CLOWNS?!?! i mean come on Pauly Shore. Come on Pauly Shore. Anyway I like the film especially the Late Nergon. When they travel into the Bio-dome, I always get chills. It is an awesome movie filled with classic comedy that even Charlie Chaplin would've loved.Mr. peanut walks down the street. He looks up at the sky and sheds a single tear. a will smith movie where he is like jack (ages quick) and becomes the first black president. These great ideas I have for movies pale in comparison to BIO-DOME.

reviews.review_title: Quite Possibly the Worst Movie Ever Made
reviews.content: * out of a million *s. Bio-Dome is so bad a movie that I refuse to waste my time by writing any more than a paragraph on it. I just think I had to express my hate to this movie, because it truly is horrible. Pauly Shore deserves those "Razzie" awards or whatever they are for Worst Actor, because he proves his lack of any trace of acting in this. The movie, which is accompanied every five minutes by a different punk rock song that sucks, is complete trash. You don't need know any more. Avoid it. It's a "Bio-Hazard" to any person who watches movies. Made me puke. Blech. PAULY SHORE SUCKS! AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

Only haters and old people review movies. I had to make an account to say that the movie didn't get worse, they just got older and forgot how to laugh at dumb things.Bio-dome is an awesome stoner comedy to watch with your friends as are all of Pauly Shore's movies. Squuuuiiirreeelllyyyyy!!!!So don't listen to all these reviews, you can even tell by how they type how lame of a person they are. It's funny all the haters come on to review movies that weren't made for them. The only reason the movie doesn't have better reviews is because people that enjoy these films are too busy out having fun with life and not writing bad things about everything they didn't enjoy online.

Do yourself a favor and ignore the negative reviews. Most of them were written 15-20 years ago at this point.Make your own assessment! First of all, this movie is free (with ads) on YouTube.I've watched the movie a couple times when I was a kid in the 90's and again a couple decades later. The humor really holds up. The cast is brilliant and Shore/Baldwin are comedy geniuses. Bio-dome has such an outlandish (yet original) plot that I'd STILL prefer over the majority of comedies made in the last 10 years.The movie is full of satire/spoof/reference humor that I think people misinterpreted for adult humor. I put this style of comedy in the Dude, Where's my Car? Or Bill and Ted style. Two idiots find themselves in a situation far beyond their intelligence - which is the golden formula. I mean, people liked Forest Gump which is the same thing with one less idiot. All jokes aside, Bio-Dome was ahead of it's time and I wish there were more comedies like it these days.

Bio-Dome is a stupid comedy about two goof-offs who get trapped in an environmental project.  (Once again casting Pauly Shore as his usually *&@#-up self).  Its funny, it is funny, one his better movies(not saying any of them are that good).  Anyone who looks for more than a few laughs in this movie is an idiot.  The key to liking movies is finding something in each of them that entertains you, they aren't all going to be Schindler's List and move you emotionally.  Think of each movie as a conversation a writer has with the audience.  Do you say earth-shattering things all the time? Neither does this movie.  This movie is the 'you're drunk around the campground saying some things funny but never really making a point' of movies.  Take it for that and it does just fine.

This movie is stupid yet funny and I don't know why. I just cannot figure out why Pauly Shore is so funny to me. Well anyways this is worth a rental if you want to see a stupid movie, if you are bored watch it on tv save your money.3/10 (just for some funny scenes)

reviews.review_title: This is the worst film I have ever seen
reviews.content: I wanted to jab my eyes out with a piece of glass. This movie was made by the devil, this is probably a form of torture in some countries. There is so much wrong with this movie it's probably easier to say what is good about this movie. The only thing I liked was that there was a tenacious D cameo. What I really hated was Pauly Shore and Stephen Baldwin. They did absolutely nothing but do some stupid stunts and tell awful jokes for 90 minuets. Who wrote this movie? Every line isn't funny at all. You know you failed when your main characters being left to die in a desert climate is the only part I was happy you failed. The first rule of writing characters is to make us like them, especially if it's a main character. Another thing I hated was the two girlfriends, those two are hot, and they are dating two idiots who any normal person would want in a mental institution. This movie actually proves something, in the film it has a message about the environment, it's good to have a message like that, but the message isn't what makes the movie, it still sucks. This gets a 1/10, no one ever watch this awful movie.

A comedy about stoners sounds like a promising premise but here all it does is produce this unfunny, illogical, stupid and boring drivel. This film is overflowing with utter rubbish at every turn. The two leads are supposed to be lovable fools but instead they are brainless jerks with endless inane catchphrases whom you rather punch in the face than feel any sympathy for, while the rest of the cast produce sub-par performances: not helped by the fact that their characters are clichéd and one dimensional. The plot is ridiculously nonsensical and predictable while the script is the pits, generating tired and/or unpleasant gags as well as convoluted plot points and an awfully slow pace. It's also painfully obvious that this film had a small budget because it looks cheap (and dated) as soon as the messy opening credits start. There simply nothing to enjoy or engage or relate to in this incompetent disaster.

Bio-Dome is one of the very few movies I couldn't even finish watching. At least I could not watch in one sitting, I had to split it up into two. I watched it, turned it off because it was awful, then started watching it again and couldn't. About a year later I watched the rest when it was on TV and literally nothing else was on. I always despised Paully Shore because he sucks and just isn't funny at all, but after this movie I really could not stand him at all. The few half decent jokes are either ruined by him or done by someone else. The Baldwin in this also sucks. There is nothing good I can say about this movie and really nothing else bad either, there's just nothing to this movie except the annoying crap.

reviews.review_title: You poor, pathetic, uncultured, haters of comedy
reviews.content: I feel bad for anyone that does not recognize Bio-Dome as the single greatest cinematic achievement in the history of film.  It is truly a classic comedy and will forever be remembered by the wise few who saw it for what it was when it came out: Oscar worthy.  Lines like, "How am I supposer to hit a double bogey with my caddy Billy with a shower iron?  Your embarasing me in front of my friends," and, "If you were yogurt would you be fruit on the bottom or stirred?" make Bio-Dome a trly memorabe comedic experience that has for hours at a time entertained my friends and me. Pauly Shore may be obnoxious and not that funny, but with Bio-Dome he has made art.  This piece would have redefined comedy as we know it were it not for the shortsighted critics and concieted hollywood elitists.May you someday grow a sense of humor.

I love this movie! It is so funny (even for Pauly Shore)!  I have to admit, I am not a big fan of Pauly Shore, but I really loved this movie!!  I think the plot itself is hilarious- two morons get locked in a sophisticated bio-dome and reak havoc.  And yet, no one likes it.  Why?  Just because Pauly Shore has a bad rap as a freak who has no talent?  If you actually sat down and watched the movie, I bet a lot of people would end up laughing a lot more than they thought they would.

reviews.review_title: You guys keep hating it, I'll keep enjoying it!
reviews.content:
You know... it is pretty darn funny to me why people waste their time on here complaining about how bad a movie was!  If you don't like it, great.  Post your 1 rating and move on.  However, people decide to dwell, leaving messages and posts about how completely terrible this movie is.  Noting that the only way to enjoy it is while you are high.  Don't you people have anything better to do.  The only time I ever post on here is to leave praise for a movie.  I figure if a movie is completely terrible, I will post my 1 or 2 rating and move on.  Said movies don't deserve my time.  Bio-Dome has obviously accomplished something if people are still complaining about it nearly a decade later.So you think Pauley Shore is a crappy actor, great.  Does that mean that this movie automatically sucks?  NO.  If you go into this movie not expecting much, you can't help but have a good time! The comedy in this movie is no different from any Sandler, Farley, Spade, or otherwise flick.  This movie is all about having fun!Try watching this on one of those weekend nights with group of buddies when you are in a retarded mood and I challenge you not to enjoy it.  No, I'm not talking about getting high (I have never and will never "get high" and I still love movies like this and half-baked... sorry guys, there goes you stoner flick stereotype).I love this movie, every time I watch it I see subtle things that stick out that make it even more enjoyable.  Check out that midget towards the end when they are dancing to the "Safety Dance." That little guy is straight out of the music video... classic!I gave this movie a 10 for sheer enjoyment.  I can watch it over and over again still love it.  Sorry guys, I'm not just some idiot "stoner" either... I love Citizen Kane, Kevin Smith Films, Dr. Strangelove, Brazil, and probably whatever other "smart" or "artsy" films you want to throw my way.  Sometimes you people have to start liking movies on your own, for your own enjoyment, apart from what society, the AFI, or even this site tells you you should like.  I'll leave you all with a few of my favorite parts in the movie.
-Breaststrokers...-I'm a sherman tank!-So... what you're really trying to say is...-Let's get that mother-faulkner!-I don't think he like the way you played with his coconuts...-Is that laughing gas?  No way...-I feel like a duck billed platypus... quaaaack quaaack.-Remember... here at Bio-Dome we strive on balancing homos, within the system.Viva Los Bio-Dome!

reviews.review_title: if you are playing truth or dare and you want someone to do a dangerous dare, use this movie as a dare by telling them to watch it.
reviews.content: -Contains some spoilers- This movie seriously gave me a headache. it's that bad to me and one of the worst i've ever seen. i don't know if the script was written like that because of Pauly Shore or if that's just Pauly Shore. Stephen Baldwin usually seem like a bad actor. i didn't hate his acting in the Flintstones Viva Rock Vegas movie, i just didn't like their story in that movie. As for Bio-Dome, the plot wasn't good. firstly, a bunch of scientists are about to go on a mission where for one year, they lock themselves in this building where they just work on their experiments. Meanwhile, two men (if you want to call them that) are acting like a bunch of weirdos (and not in a good way) play paper, rock, scissors and Pauly Shore wins and acts like an idiot when he wins. to get out of doing something for Earth Day with their really pretty girlfriends, Shore hits Baldwin with a book and makes the girls mad (who see through their excuse).So the girls decide to make them jealous by going off and calling them and telling them they are going to hang out with some guys which of course works (since these two seem to not have brains a lot of the time). they get there and realize that they were tricked, so they go home and (thinking it to be a mall) go into the Bio-Dome as it's being locked. so sure enough, these two are locked in with the scientists for a year. i won't spoil too much more, but basically after they are locked in with the scientists, Shore and Baldwin just act like a bunch of morons while the viewer watches and tries to find out what's funny. honestly, i think i found one funny moment in what's supposed to be (i think) a comedy. i don't recommend anyone to see this movie unless you just like hearing Pauly Shore make really stupid noises (which he does throughout the whole movie). Some will like it, but to me, it's just annoying and it made me feel like my IQ dropped.

How can you people sit there and say its bad? It's a comedy for crying out loud.  Who cares if its got a lousy plot don't you think its funny, I mean when he initially pee's in the water and the computer starts alarming about bio hazardous crap in there that was funny so I don't know what is wrong with you people but this is a great comical movie.8.5/10 Es ist gut

reviews.review_title: Not meant to be taken seriously, people!
reviews.content: This is not Schindler's List and it's excellent for what it is. It's hilarious. It's entertaining. People that dis this movie for being light forget it's not meant to be a conversation piece for an intellectual salon. I think the humor is quite clever at times. Get a sense of humor!

Word of warning - this is not a 'classic' movie. This is not a movie to discuss the hidden sociological meanings of with your English teacher for 5 hours. This is however, a good-time movie.Like I just said, to enjoy this movie best you should watch it with a group of friends and be prepared to quote it until the end of time. This is the type of comedy which appeals to people who find themselves laughing at fart jokes and rude ink stains on bits of paper. But that's not to say it is a bad film. Most of the scenes are full of movement and witty, quick dialogue, not to mention THE best fitting soundtrack. It ranges from "The Safety Dance" to party-pop-punk to Faith No More, but every second of music fits the video perfectly.There isn't really much else which can be said about this film other than to DEFINITELY check it out if you are into 'brainless' comedies and quoting stupid films with your friends. If you consider yourself 'intellictual' then stay well away as you wont enjoy this.
You either Love it or hate it... Personally I thought it was good.

I was surfing IMDb top lists, and tried to think of my personal top list, and suddenly came to think of Bio Dome.It's been a few years since I last saw this movie, back when it was releashed I saw the movie a dozen times. And I loved it more each time.I can see that people have very different opinions about this movie, which is easy to understand. The kind of humor in this movie requires a special audience .. And I'm just happy to be one of those special people :)I'll just leave it with a 10 in the vote rating, put on the soundtrack that have been sitting in the back of my cd collection for way to long. and go and order it on DVD , to see if it's not still as funny as I remember it to be.

reviews.review_title: The least funny comedy I have ever seen
reviews.content: It's a Pauly Shore comedy - so I'm not asking for high art, but come on! Shouldn't a comedy have humour in it? Okay, the good things about this film... ... ... Well about 10 minutes in, Pauly's girlfriend makes a joke about men that made me chuckle... A couple of the actresses are cute... Actually, credit goes to a couple actors for trying to salvage this film. But nothing can save it. These types of movies rely 99% on the comedy duo. The guys from "Dude, Where's My Car" were watchable. The guys in "Harold and Kumar..." were watchable. Shore and Baldwin are unwatchable - and so is this movie.

reviews.review_title: Warning: Toxins are being introduced into the rain forest
reviews.content:
This movie is the funniest comedy of all time (at least on my list).  I haven't seen this movie for years until yesterday.  I laughed all over again.   The movie is about two junior college buddies, Bud and Doyle, who, on Earth Day no less, become trapped in the Bio-Dome, an environmental experimental thing in the middle of Tusan.  Now they are trapped inside for a year and must adapt to being off their couch for more than 5 seconds. 
This movie is an instant classic, trust me.BEST LINES   Line 1                           DOYLE: Bio Dome.  Does that mean it goes both ways?                               BUD: I don't know, but we do. Line 2                                 BUD: Excuse me, miss.  Are you tired?                                MIMI: No, why?                                 BUD: Because you've been runnin' through my mind all                        day

i actually enjoyed Bio-dome sure the premise and the actors all sucked but it was a funny movie. i didn't love it but i was merely was amused by it. Pauly Shore wasn't the best choice for this movie. it should have been done by a bunch no-named actors so Pauly wouldn't suck even worse than he already did. Same for the Baldwin that was there too. it's a shame they could have been lawyers or doctors. i'd rather have Pauly Shore operate on me than tell me jokes. what else sucked about this movie was the fact that the premise was HORRIBLE. two stoners trapped in a bubble? i could think of something more interesting after i overdose on opium

reviews.review_title: I understand now why people hate Pauly Shore films...
reviews.content: ...because they are uniformly awful. Does he have no one around him to tell him 'no'? If you decide to watch it, turn your brain off. Literally. This film will cause pain and damage. You have been warned.

This movie is so fun, but it's not smart. It's mad dumb and that's the point. It's a light, silly comedy that doesn't take itself seriously at all. Watch this when you wanna turn off for a night. If you know Pauly Shore at all, you know what you're getting into. I grew up on this, and to me it's a classic.. it won't be for everyone and even those it's for May not be sure about how they actually feel. But it's enjoyable, silly, funny, and super dumb. Enjoy, and have a good time with what this is.

reviews.review_title: Only funny if you have a good sense of humor otherwise you'll hate it
reviews.content: You either love it or you don't if you like comedies that are funny just to be funny then you'll love this movie. It's hilariously ridiculous and doesn't try to be anything else. For the bad reviews on here It's your fault if you watch the Pauly Shore movie thinking that it was going to be anything but ridiculous That's on you.

Obviously when you click (or insert, depending on your age) on this movie you're hopefully already aware of the silliness that is about to ensue. Yeah, it's corny but there's some good one liners that made me laugh out loud, I'm not ashamed to say. Its not for everyone, but not as bad as it seems.

How can you say this stuff about Pauly Shore, he's one of the funniest comediens I've ever seen, and his films rock. I can't stand all you people saying you hate his films.. .Brain wave, if you don't like his films, don't watch them. It's that simple. This film is a much see though, and I know I love it, so that's all that matters to me, so :P

This movie is one of the best examples of Paulie Shores genius. Teamed with Stephen Baldwin, Paulie makes this funny story of two screw-ups trapped in a science experiment, the best it can be. I've personally seen the movie over 30 times. Its quite enjoyable and very funny. I definitely recommend this movie to anyone who loves Paulie Shores unique humor and even those who don't. Two thumbs up!

reviews.review_title: Boy is Kylie Minogue Good Looking!!
reviews.content: This was a very poor movie, although it had it's good points. But being an Aussie almost ex-teenager, I quite enjoyed looking at the women. And Kylie is so cute. 5ft Nothing and gorgeous!!Although she needs more of an active part. Her talent was really wasted.

I love this movie if you like a good old laugh then this is the one for you it is a bit corny and can be a bit silly but if you like California man and movies that are like this then this is the one to watch its one of them movies you can watch over and over again. Pauly shore was first on MTV and his personality on this show is how he acts a bit stupid but it still works. i would recommend this movie to anyone who likes a good laugh. if you do enjoy this movie check out son in law kinda on the same wave length as this movie also funny and corny.Kylie Minogue is great in this movie as well and quite funny too. Steven Baldwin in usual suspect is very tense in this extremely entertaining

Pauly Shore has definitely done it again. This movie stands out to be one of his funniest ever. Stephen Baldwin and him make a hilarious duo. They both handle their roles so great and can easily make you laugh at any moment during the movie. Another great character in the movie that is usually overlooked is the mad scientist type guy played by William Atherton. He actually provides some laughs too. If you want to see a movie with Pauly Shore at his best than go out and rent Bio Dome, or better yet buy it.

reviews.review_title: IF ALL LIFE ON EARTH DEPENDED ON JUST TWO PEOPLE----- LETS HOPE THEY ARE BUD AND DOYLE!
reviews.content: When I first heard of the real scientific experiment; I understood the value and need for such serious, work and learning. This film shows us how to have success, fun, failure, hard work and more success and fun and help save the ecology all at the same time. And quite safely to I might add.I found many parts of the film very silly, but without those parts, the comedy would have lessened for the tensions where strung very well. By the end of the film I too had come to love our to ecologists for a year. And face it. Anyone who can Whoudinie a back door for a awesome party can't be all bad!Once again I found myself hypnotized by the stunning vision of womanhood that Patricia Hearst casts. Again combining short vignettes, with the utmost ability to move the audience to feel her characters emotions and reactions.  Ever growing and learning to perfection.Another movie I will see again with great enjoyment.D.A.T.

I love this movie. i am a HUGE HUGE Stephen Baldwin fan and i dont think him or this movie ever get enough credit..sure Pauley Shores in it but really its not that bad. I love this movie so much i could do all the dialect to it at any time.I really funny especially if you get the inside jokes since ive been watching movie my whole life i have knowledge of other ones which are incorporated in it. I think that if you like Stephen and are looking for some comedy you should watch this movie.

I've watched it twice just to make sure I wasn't being uptight and missing some type if subtle, tongue in cheek, poking-fun-at-self humor. Nope, I didn't miss anything. This piece of bio-garbage is embarrassingly ignorant and as bad as it gets. Schindler's List contained more comedic value. Shore and Baldwin's agonizing schtick was like a couple of 12 year olds trying to yuck it up for the camera...unsuccessfully.
Please iMDb, add the option for negative stars so I can re-rate this someday.

reviews.review_title: A great comedy. One you can just watch over and over again.
reviews.content: I'm sorry.. I know there are a lot of people out there that don't like these types of movies.  But while most people would classify this movie as "low brow", I call it uproarious.  It doesn't lag even the slightest, as a lot of "low brow" movies do.  It's solid, non-stop hilarity.  This is one of 3 or 4 movies (Airheads being another) that I can watch over and over again and never get tired of it.  If what you want is laughs, and just an over-all good time, check this out.

Pauly Shore is back in this funny film "Bio-Dome"! Out of all the films hes in i would have to say this is my second fav. The movie is quite funny with a good soundtrack and lots of funny jokes. i would tell any fan of P S to see this film.

I totally laughed my pants off and could´nt stop crying. Thats what comedy is all about. No consideration in that i watched Bio-dome 4 o clock in the morning. I stayed awake though. I had a great time that night (early morning).But i would never watch it again it would just spoil the experience.LOL

Equal parts emotional salience, social commentary, and ascendant, second-to-none humor. Only eclipsed by The Godfather.I have just been notified that I need at least 150 characters to submit this review, so that's why I keep writing.

I just saw this film today on TV. Originally I tuned in because Kylie Minogue was in it, but something about the two "dudes" made me keep watching. Firstly, both were familiar faces. Secondly, both seemed to really be enjoying their parts. It was mindless stuff. But, again, when it doesn't take itself seriously then this can give mindless laughter.And all in all it was a well done mindless comedy - sure, no Adam Sandler effort, but nonetheless could entertain you for 90 minutes if your into that sort of stuff (if you are not, however, I think you will despise the jokes on offer here). Also it may be of extra entertainment value at seeing some stars of the present day as they were 8 years ago. 6/10.
Bio-dome is the best movie ever made. I have seen this movie for about 30 times and it is still funny. If you like the humor of Paully Shore then you have to see this one.
